import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Search, Plus, Edit, Trash2, Building2, User } from 'lucide-react'; const ClientManagement = () => { const [clients, setClients] = useState([ { id: "CLI001", name: "Entreprise ABC", type: "company", email: "contact@abc.com", subsidiaries: ["Filiale 1", "Filiale 2"], fleetSize: 15 }, { id: "CLI002", name: "Jean Martin", type: "individual", email: "jean.martin@email.com", orders: 2 } ]); const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const [filterType, setFilterType] = useState('all'); const deleteClient = (clientId) => { setClients(clients.filter(client => client.id !== clientId)); }; return (

{client.id} {client.name} {client.type === 'company' ? ( <> Entreprise ) : ( <> Particulier )} {client.email} {client.type === 'company' ? ( {client.subsidiaries.length} filiales, {client.fleetSize} véhicules ) : ( {client.orders} commandes )}
); }; export default ClientManagement;
